DOC.brief_summary: The purpose research study determine TLK286 give combination carboplatin effective liposomal doxorubicin treat woman recurrent ovarian epithelial cancer , fallopian tube cancer , primary peritoneal cancer , refractory resistant platinum chemotherapy .
DOC.brief_title: TLK286 ( Telcyta ) Combination With Carboplatin ( Paraplatin ) Versus Doxil Platinum Refractory Resistant Ovarian Cancer
DOC.criteria: Are woman 18 year age old Have histologically cytologically confirm epithelial cancer ovary fallopian tube , primary peritoneal cancer Have platinum refractory resistant cancer Measurable disease accord radiographic RECIST criterion document tumor progression Had treatment firstline chemotherapy platinumbased regimen ( carboplatin cisplatin ) Have clinically significant cardiac disease Have sign intestinal obstruction interfere nutrition time study entry Are pregnant lactating Had prior treatment liposomal doxorubicin ovarian cancer Had prior treatment TLK286
